amendment.description: To study the impact of commissary privatization prior to initiating a pilot program and to require a report on the Department of Defense definition of and policy regarding software sustainment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1911 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1911 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1456. (consideration: CR S4188; text: CR S4188) To study the impact of commissary privatization prior to initiating a pilot program and to require a report on the Department of Defense definition of and policy regarding software sustainment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1911 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1456.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1911 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
